title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Joe Burrow's potential after getting a win over the Jaguars and why he has Joe Montana potential if this one thing happens in his career. He pushes back against the criticism Bill Belichick's received for the breakup with Tom Brady and why it really doesn't really matter in the end. He gives out his Blazing 5 picks for week 5 in the NFL. Plus, 3-time Super Bowl champion Darren Woodson joins the show to tell Colin the Cowboys defense is good enough to contend for a Super Bowl this year.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
